Class ec.e.quake.SimplySturdyTether 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.quake.Tether
           |
           +----ec.e.quake.SimplySturdyTether
public class SimplySturdyTether
extends Tether
A Tether that is unaffected by a quake-drill. Used both for sturdy root holders and for sturdy leafs.
See Also:
makeSturdyRoot

SimplySturdyTether(Vat, Object)
Returns a Tether of 'vat' from which 'held' will be accessible, even following a quake-drill.

reconstructed()
Overridden to provide the pre-quake held object as the post-quake held object.
smash()
Overridden to do nothing

SimplySturdyTether 
  public SimplySturdyTether(Vat vat,
                            Object held)
Returns a Tether of 'vat' from which 'held' will be accessible, even following a quake-drill.

reconstructed 
  protected Object reconstructed()
Overridden to provide the pre-quake held object as the post-quake held object.

Overridden to do nothing
